I just started listening to FLAC the other day, and I love it completely. I've already got the Beatles' Anthology and that's amazing. What I like about Mylo Xyloto is that in "Paradise", you can clearly hear the violin in the opening, and the drums have such a deep, clear sound (important to me as a drummer).
